title: Question:
author: Majestic-milf
content: This is the place to discuss matches connected to Norwegian Eliteserien   While we wait for the Premier league, the Italian Serie A, the German Bundesliga, the French Ligue 1 and the rest of them to begin, we could use this League discussion amongst others to keep the bets alive and going.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: Majestic-milf on June 18, 2022, 05:03:50 PM This is the place to discuss matches connected to Norwegian Eliteserien   While we wait for the Premier league, the Italian Serie A, the German Bundesliga, the French Ligue 1 and the rest of them to begin, we could use this League discussion amongst others to keep the bets alive and going.It is been quite a few years I have not followed the Eliteserien after Rosenborg started to make me lose a lot and I mean a lot of bets as they were starting to reduce their form and seeing that they still haven't recovered being in 7 place with just 10 points difference to the leaders.I see the followers at that time now being in the top fighting for the title with Lillestrom leading the table and Molde together with Viking following,back then when I used to follow this league they were followers with Molde somewhat better as starting to become a serious threat to Rosenborg.Usually this league had little upsets so I loved this one until upsets became common here.I don't know the situation now so I will follow this thread if I ever want to bet on Eliteserien.

comments.author: Joca97
comments.body: Quote from: Majestic-milf on June 18, 2022, 05:03:50 PM This is the place to discuss matches connected to Norwegian Eliteserien   While we wait for the Premier league, the Italian Serie A, the German Bundesliga, the French Ligue 1 and the rest of them to begin, we could use this League discussion amongst others to keep the bets alive and going.This is a good thread thanks for coming up for it. I think this league is really intresting and its a good thing that it is played in the summer while we wait for bigger leagues. Also there are a lot of good teams especially Bodo glimt that improved a lot in the past years

comments.author: LGD2Business
comments.body: Bodø/Glimt didn't start the season well this time, they were pretty good last two seasons. Lillestrøm is leading as undefeated now. Molde is after them. Rosenborg is another team that started the season badly. What I like about the Norwegian league is the high level of competition. You don't see a single team come forward. There are many candidates for the championship. Previously, Rosenborg was a permanent champion alone, but this changed. They haven't won the league in the last three seasons. Molde won first, then Bodø/Glimt made twice in a row. When the matches are full of goals, they are exciting, but we have to say that the general quality is very low compared to other big European leagues.

comments.author: Alisha-k
comments.body: It seems lillestrom are taking the lead in the beginning but let's see how they continue if they can still impress the fans. Since the  start of this season, they have been able to maintain a stellar record, beating Sandjerford, valenragra and the others but lost to Ham Kam.  It's going to a tough season as the competition is quite tight and molde look to be trailing behind with 25 points as against lillestrom 27. Today's game will determine if they still get to remain at the top or they will forfeit.

comments.author: bering
comments.body: FK Bodø/Glimt still struggle to find their best performance and as the previous champion they starting this season with unsatisfied performance 4 wins 4 draws and 2 lose but win from Kristiansund last week could be positive result by them and their players hoping this results will continue and Lillestrøm still strong at the first position with unbeatable actually since last season Lillestrøm had been showed stable performance with finish at 4th position but this season whether they can able to break Bodø/Glimt domination and win the league so looking forward to see their performance for upcoming matches

comments.author: Roidz
comments.body: Quote from: Joca97 on June 18, 2022, 06:57:13 PMQuote from: Majestic-milf on June 18, 2022, 05:03:50 PM This is the place to discuss matches connected to Norwegian Eliteserien   While we wait for the Premier league, the Italian Serie A, the German Bundesliga, the French Ligue 1 and the rest of them to begin, we could use this League discussion amongst others to keep the bets alive and going.This is a good thread thanks for coming up for it. I think this league is really intresting and its a good thing that it is played in the summer while we wait for bigger leagues. Also there are a lot of good teams especially Bodo glimt that improved a lot in the past yearsI actually don't follow to everything that happens in the Norwegian football competition, maybe it's not just me but some of us are not too familiar with the Norwegian league, my only curiosity about the Norwegian league was when Bodo/Glimt managed to beat As Roma in group stage and also the round of 8 conference league rounds this season and I search on google where the Bodo/Glimt club came from at that time, their performance in the conference league was really quite impressive, especially when they managed to beat the team coached by mourinho with a pretty big score at that time.
